Glucosure Star Meter

"Checking your Blood Glucose is easy now with Most powerful Glucosure Star Meter"

Why GlucoSure Star?

Today diabetes is not a disease but pandemic and you have to manage it to live a wonderful life. You can test your your blood glucose levels at home and you can deal with its spikes There are dozens of brands of Gluco meter available in the Market in different qualities But You Deserve The Best quality Glucosure Star meter is the best in its class We assure you of the best possible standard.

GlucoSure STAR High Performance Blood Glucose Monitoring System


Glucosure STAR is a full feature blood glucose monitoring system that needs very small sample volume to test. It provides greater comfort and has choice of different testing sites (palm, forearm and finger).

Key Features

1. Measurement Range: 20~600mg/dL
2. Test Time: 6 Seconds
3. Hematocrit: 30~55%
4. Battery Life: 1000 tests
5. Operating temperature: 10℃ to 40℃
6. Size: 90(L) x 53(W) x 20(H) mm
7. Memory: 300 sets with Date and Time
8. Power Supply: 1.5V AAA Batterys x 2
9. Data Management: 7,14,30 Days Averaging
10. Download Capability: USB Via RS232 Interface
11. Additional Features: Test Strip Ejection

Compatible Test Strip

1. GlucoSure STAR Blood Glucose Test Strip
